content:
# We have successfully harvested 10 iron ore. Now we can use the Stone Furnaces to smelt this iron ore into iron plates.

# 1. First, we need to check the recipe for the Iron Plate to ensure we have enough resources.
iron_plate_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.IronPlate)

# 2. Ensure we have enough coal and iron ore to smelt into iron plates.
if inspect_inventory()[Prototype.IronOre] >= 10 and inspect_inventory()[Prototype.Coal] >= 5:
    # 3. Insert the iron ore into the first furnace.
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace_1, quantity=10)
else:
    print("Not enough resources to smelt iron plates.")

# 4. Check the status of the furnace after inserting iron ore.
print(f"Furnace 1 status after inserting iron ore: {furnace_1.status}, warnings: {furnace_1.warnings}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
